home.suspected_lcp: H1 Text ('Dr. Sayuj Krishnan...') on Mobile / DoctorCard Image on Desktop
bottlenecks: Font loading strategy was 'optional', causing potential FOIT (Flash of Invisible Text) or permanent fallback on slow networks.
HeroCTAButtons (client component) in LCP area might delay interactivity (TBT) but less critical for LCP than text.

changes.description: Changed next/font display strategy from 'optional' to 'swap' for Inter and Merriweather fonts.
changes.expected_impact: Improve LCP by ensuring text is visible immediately (via fallback font) instead of being blocked for up to 100ms. Since next/font automatically adjusts fallback metrics (size-adjust), this swap should NOT cause CLS.
changes.verification_steps: Run build. Inspect app/layout.tsx to confirm 'display: swap'. Use browser developer tools (Network tab) to simulate slow network and verify text is visible immediately.
